titles.title: Commending veterans of the Korean Constabulary for their outstanding sacrifice and service and urging the Government of the Republic of Korea to recognize the service and sacrifice made by the Korean Constabulary.

Commending veterans of the Korean Constabulary for their outstanding sacrifice and service and urging the Government of the Republic of Korea to recognize the service and sacrifice made by the Korean Constabulary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Commends the Korean Constabulary for their bravery and honorable service and recognizes members of the Constabulary for their 1946-1948 service.
Urges the government of the Republic of Korea to reevaluate its military benefits program, including the benefits provided to Constabulary veterans.
